About

PDF

Hi! My name is Magnus Møller. A danish programmer born in 1993.

I am a master student from Technical University of Denmark. With a bachelor's degree from The UCPH Department of Computer Science

I enjoy Functional Programming and Domain-Specific Languages.

On this site you should be able to find some of the things i am working on.
